user.title: Set up Mygren Heat Pump
user.description: Enter the connection details for your Mygren heat pump.

data_description.host: The address of your heat pump (e.g., https://192.168.1.100 or https://mygren.home.arpa). Uses HTTPS by default.
data_description.verify_ssl: Disable for self-signed certificates (most local installations).

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the heat pump. Check the host address and ensure the heat pump is reachable. If using HTTPS with a self-signed certificate, make sure 'Verify SSL certificate' is unchecked.

abort.already_configured: This heat pump is already configured.
